text: Quavious Keyate Marshall, known as Quavo () (born April 2, 1991), is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer. He is a member of the trio Migos along with Kirshnik Ball (aka Takeoff) and Kiari Cephus (aka Offset). Quavo is based in the U.S. state of Georgia. He released his first album in 2018. ==Personal life== Quavo got into a fight with his ex-girlfriend Saweetie in an elevator. On November 1, 2022 Quavo was playing dice with a group when a fight broke out that resulted in the shooting and killing of his nephew and member of Migos, Takeoff. Two additional victims were initially reported and their condition remains unclear. == Discography == === Studio albums === List of studio albums Title Album details Peak chart positions Certifications US AUS CAN DEN NZ SWE Click on "Veckans albumlista".
